security_breach_news.title: Major Security Breach in the News
security_breach_news.description: A high-profile cyber attack has made headlines, causing organizations worldwide to reassess their security measures.

choices.text: Keep a low profile until the heat dies down

effects.message: The security scare has passed. You're safer now.

choices.text: Take advantage of the chaos to strike while security is distracted

effects.message: You successfully capitalize on the confusion, accessing several vulnerable systems.
Your opportunistic attack backfires. You're now on multiple watchlists.

choices.text: Study the attack methods to improve your own techniques

immediate.message: You learn valuable techniques from analyzing the breach.

insider_contact.title: Insider Contact Offer
insider_contact.description: A disgruntled employee from a major corporation reaches out, offering inside information in exchange for your services.

choices.text: Accept their offer and form a partnership

immediate.message: You gain a valuable inside contact but increase your exposure risk.

choices.text: Politely decline and maintain your independence

immediate.message: Your professional discretion earns respect in the underground community.

choices.text: Extract information without committing to partnership

effects.message: You cleverly extract valuable intel without making commitments.
Your manipulation attempt backfires. Word spreads about your untrustworthiness.

law_enforcement_pressure.title: Increased Law Enforcement Activity
law_enforcement_pressure.description: Police and federal agents have increased their cyber crime task force activities. The streets feel more dangerous.

choices.text: Relocate to a different city temporarily

immediate.message: You successfully evade the heat but lose local connections.

effects.message: You've established new operations in your temporary location.

choices.text: Invest in better operational security

immediate.message: Enhanced security measures reduce your detectability.

choices.text: Suspend all operations for an extended period

immediate.message: You go completely dark, becoming nearly invisible to authorities.

effects.message: The extended break has significantly reduced law enforcement interest.

technology_breakthrough.title: Technology Breakthrough
technology_breakthrough.description: A new technological advancement has been announced that could revolutionize infiltration techniques.

choices.text: Acquire the new technology through black market channels

immediate.message: You successfully acquire cutting-edge technology, enhancing your capabilities.

choices.text: Focus on developing countermeasures against this technology

immediate.message: You develop effective countermeasures, making you harder to catch.

choices.text: Attempt to steal the technology blueprints directly

effects.message: Incredible success! You steal the blueprints and can sell them for massive profit.
The heist fails catastrophically. You're now a high-priority target.

rival_infiltrator.title: Rival Infiltrator Encounter
rival_infiltrator.description: You've discovered another infiltrator working the same target you had planned to hit. They haven't noticed you yet.

choices.text: Approach them and propose collaboration

effects.message: You successfully form an alliance with a skilled peer.
They reject your offer and report your presence to increase security.

choices.text: Sabotage their operation to eliminate competition

effects.message: You successfully sabotage their operation, establishing dominance.
Your sabotage attempt backfires, creating a dangerous enemy.

choices.text: Withdraw and find a different target

immediate.message: You avoid conflict but lose time finding alternative opportunities.

security_guard_encounter.title: Unexpected Security Guard
security_guard_encounter.description: While infiltrating the facility, you encounter a security guard making an unscheduled patrol.

choices.text: Hide and wait for them to pass

effects.message: You successfully hide until the guard passes.
The guard almost spots you and becomes suspicious.

choices.text: Approach and convince them you belong here

effects.message: The guard believes your cover story and even helps you.
The guard becomes suspicious and calls for backup.

choices.text: Create a distraction to lure them away

effects.message: Your distraction works perfectly, clearing your path.
The distraction fails and draws unwanted attention.

choices.text: Neutralize the guard non-lethally

effects.message: You successfully neutralize the guard without permanent harm.
The struggle alerts other security personnel.

system_firewall.title: Advanced Firewall Detected
system_firewall.description: You encounter an unexpectedly sophisticated firewall protecting the target system.

choices.text: Attempt to brute force through the firewall

effects.message: You break through but leave significant traces.
The brute force attempt triggers security alerts.

choices.text: Social engineer an employee for access credentials

effects.message: You successfully obtain legitimate credentials.
The employee becomes suspicious and reports the interaction.

choices.text: Search for hidden backdoors or vulnerabilities

effects.message: You discover a hidden vulnerability that provides clean access.
Extensive searching yields no results, wasting precious time.

choices.text: Abort digital infiltration and switch to physical approach

immediate.message: You abandon the digital approach and prepare for physical infiltration.

valuable_intelligence.title: Unexpected Intelligence Discovery
valuable_intelligence.description: While searching through the target's systems, you discover information far more valuable than your original objective.

choices.text: Extract the additional intelligence despite increased risk

effects.message: You successfully extract highly valuable bonus intelligence.
Your greed triggers additional security measures.

choices.text: Stick to your original objective to minimize risk

immediate.message: You maintain discipline and complete your original mission cleanly.

choices.text: Mark the location for a future operation

immediate.message: You carefully note the intelligence location for a future heist.

investigation_launched.title: Criminal Investigation Launched
investigation_launched.description: Your recent activities have triggered a formal criminal investigation. Law enforcement is actively searching for you.

effects.message: A formal investigation makes all operations significantly more dangerous.

choices.text: Hire a criminal defense lawyer preemptively

immediate.message: Legal representation provides some protection against investigation.

choices.text: Destroy all potentially incriminating evidence

immediate.message: You eliminate evidence but lose valuable resources.

choices.text: Flee to a non-extradition country

immediate.message: You escape immediate danger but become an international fugitive.

asset_seizure.title: Asset Seizure
asset_seizure.description: Authorities have frozen your known financial accounts and seized suspected criminal proceeds.

effects.message: Law enforcement seizes a significant portion of your liquid assets.

choices.text: Challenge the seizure through legal channels

effects.message: You successfully recover some assets through legal action.
The legal challenge fails and draws more attention.

choices.text: Accept the loss and rebuild from scratch

immediate.message: You accept the setback and focus on rebuilding operations.

mysterious_benefactor.title: Mysterious Benefactor
mysterious_benefactor.description: An anonymous contact offers you a lucrative job through encrypted channels. The offer seems too good to be true.

choices.text: Accept the job despite the mysterious nature

immediate.message: You complete the job successfully but wonder about your employer's true identity.

choices.text: Investigate the benefactor's identity before deciding

effects.message: Your investigation reveals disturbing connections to a powerful shadow organization.
Your investigation triggers countermeasures, revealing nothing.

choices.text: Decline the suspicious offer

immediate.message: Your caution earns respect among peers who know the risks of mysterious benefactors.
